channel.title: PROJECTS on Portfolio | Huang Chuan
channel.description: Recent content in PROJECTS on Portfolio | Huang Chuan

item.title: Business Analytics Using Data Mining
item.description: Product Bundling using Machine Learning for Increasing Profit while Promoting Sustainable Purchase Behaviors at Little Green Shop

item.title: Tangjuan
item.description: As a on-going side project derived from a gossip about personal finance, Tang Juan took a bottom-up approach to implement a web app for empowering user making well-informed personal financial decision. This project is built with Python (Backend/Flask) and Javascript. (Frontend/Vue.js)

item.title: NJFP
item.description: NJFP is a side project aims to provide a hosting service for people easily managing their project experiences. Serving as a self-taught project, NJFP started from defining need and goals with persona, creating Figma prototype, hosting UI components on Storybook, to defining ER diagram and setting api documentation with Swagger UI.
